data.title: Barclays Center Business Alliance with Roc Nation Music
data.meta_description: Barclays Center and Roc Nation Music have collaborated on a multi-year business alliance that will provide dynamic content for Barclays Center, including Roc Nation artist performances, festivals, TIDAL events and emerging artist showcases. data.meta_site_name: Music Connection Magazine - Informing Music People Since 1977 - Music Information - Music Education - Music Industry News
data.text:
Barclays Center and Roc Nation Music have collaborated on a multi-year business alliance that will provide dynamic content for Barclays Center, including Roc Nation artist performances, festivals, TIDAL events and emerging artist showcases. Jay Z will perform annually at the venue.

"We've been fortunate that many of Roc Nation's top artists, such as Jay Z, Rihanna and Kanye West have performed at Barclays Center and this alliance only further solidifies our great relationship," said Barclays Center CEO Brett Yormark. "We're thrilled to continue to bring exciting entertainment to Brooklyn and are proud that Roc Nation Music is calling Barclays Center home."

Read More: Brooklyn Direct Brings Exclusive Concerts to Brooklyn and Beyond

Roc Nation is a full-service entertainment company, inclusive of artist, songwriter, producer and engineer management; music publishing; touring and merchandising; film and television; new business ventures; and a music label.

Roc Nation Music services a diverse roster of critically acclaimed recording artists, writers and producers, many of whom have performed at Barclays Center, including Capital Cities, Haim, Big Sean, J. Cole, Rita Ora, Timbaland and more.

On Sept. 28, 2012, Jay Z performed the first of eight consecutive sold out shows to celebrate the opening of Barclays Center, unveiling the new Brooklyn Nets uniform on stage and marrying sports and entertainment together in a new fashion.
